funding-group.funding-statement: This work was funded by the Global Environmental Facility/World Bank through the Integrated National Adaptation Pilot, a project executed in the Instituto Nacional de Salud de Colombia. It also received funding from the National Virology Laboratory of the Instituto Nacional de Salud de Colombia, the Yale Climate and Energy Institute (grant awarded to MAD) and the National Socio-Environmental Synthesis Center (postdoctoral fellowships of HP, AB). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
